message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'll take the bigger share, but I'm willing to negotiate if you think it's too lopsided.
That's a very uneven split, Alice. How about we go with 60/40?  It accounts for the time-value of the money, giving you a better deal than waiting.
Okay, I'll take a smaller share this time to get the deal done. But I'm not going lower than 5500.  It's getting risky waiting longer.
